segments.text: The air quality in this city is horrendous . The pollution levels are so high that we are not supposed to go outside with a face mask again !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Exhaust fumes from vehicles cause a great deal of damage to the environment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: On top of that , there are a few large chemical factories in the suburbs , which are contributing to the high pollution levels in the water and the air in this city .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As much as I love this city , I think I'm going to find a greener city to live in . Living in a polluted city like this just can't be good for my health .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know what you mean . However , there are so few places left that have not been affected by global warming . If it's not the pollution , then it's the natural disasters , deforestation , or the greenhouse effect .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What is the greenhouse effect exactly ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's the gradual rise in the earth's temperature .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see , so it's similar to global warming ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They're related to one another , yes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I heard that some people in England are pleased with the fact that the climate is becoming warmer because it's making their towns a more pleasant place to live .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: People joke about the benefits of the increase in temperature , but it's not all good news . They've been experiencing a lot of deadly storms there as well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: People always seem to make jokes as a way to deal with unfortunate situations .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think if everyone pitches in , the world will be a better place .
segments.speaker: S1
